articles.description: The latest breaking news, comment and features from The Independent.

articles.author: Thomas Kingsley
articles.title: Greenford ‘murder’: Man, 44, charged after fatal stabbing of pensioner on mobility scooter
articles.description: Thomas O’Halloran travelled around 75 yards on his scooter desperately looking for help after he was stabbed
articles.content:
A 44-year-old man has been charged with the murder of 87-year-old Thomas OHalloran while he was on his mobility scooter in Ealing. 
Lee Byer, of Southall, west London, will appear at Willesden Magis… [+2718 chars]

articles.author: Geoffrey Macnab
articles.title: Is Moonraker the worst Bond movie ever or an unheralded 007 masterpiece?
articles.description: Quentin Tarantino and Roger Avary have had heated discussions about the merits of the 1979 film. Is it as transcendentally brilliant as Avary argues or as much of a train wreck as Tarantino suggests? Geoffrey Macnab weighs up the pros and cons
articles.content:
Its the James Bond movie in which Roger Moores 007 has sex in zero gravity, in outer space, while the Queen watches back home via a satellite transmission.
My God, what is Bond doing? M splutters.
… [+65 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Whiting
articles.title: Bad Sisters review: Sharon Horgan’s dark, bonkers comedy will have you rooting for a clan of murderous women
articles.description: This new series, adapted from Belgian thriller ‘Clan’, introduces an enchantingly charismatic set of Irish sisters all plotting against one abusive man
articles.content: John-Paul Williams is a bad, bad husband. Hes belittling, controlling, physically imposing. He exclusively calls his wife mammy, even in front of company. In other words, he has to go. Mercifully, wh… [+2731 chars]

articles.author: Stuti Mishra
articles.title: Tube strikes – live: London-wide walkout hits Underground, rail and bus services
articles.description: Around 10,000 Tube workers in the RMT union are expected to go on strike
articles.content:
After train strikes yesterday, now London-wide strikes by Underground and bus drivers are set to affect Tube, rail and bus services.
The 24-hour tube strike today will see the RMT Union working for … [+4484 chars]

articles.author: Adam Forrest
articles.title: Labour demands recall of parliament over cost of living ‘emergency’
articles.description: Campaigners say early return of MPs could help lay ‘groundwork’ for more emergency support
articles.content:
Labour has written to Boris Johnson and the two Tory leadership contenders to demand parliament returns early in order to tackle the deepening cost of living emergency.
The call for MPs to return tw… [+3982 chars]

articles.author: Rob Merrick
articles.title: Rishi Sunak vows to ‘restore’ NHS dentistry admitting patients cannot get ‘care they need’
articles.description: Former chancellor seeks to switch Tory leadership campaign focus to public services with five-point plan
articles.content:
Rishi Sunak has vowed to end the crisis in NHS dentistry which is forcing some people to pull out their own teeth, stepping up his battle with Liz Truss for No 10.
A staggering 9 out 10 dental pract… [+2558 chars]

articles.author: Nadine White
articles.title: If Owami Davies were white, her disappearance would cause more concern
articles.description: A pervasive disregard for Black lives is the underlying reason for these dangerously inadequate responses to Black people going missing
articles.content: When Sarah Everard went missing last year, the UK rightly saw wall-to-wall media coverage as the Metropolitan Police appealed for information. Similarly, this was seen when Libby Squire went missing … [+4073 chars]

articles.author: John Rentoul
articles.title: We’re heading for a Liz Truss victory – here’s what I got wrong
articles.description: Good forecasters go back over their predictions to try to learn from their mistakes – and I thought Rishi Sunak would win, writes John Rentoul
articles.content: Dominic Cummings is not the only person who has read Superforecasting, the book by Philip Tetlock and Dan Gardner. I read it when it was published seven years ago, and thought it had important insigh… [+859 chars]

articles.author: Cathy Newman
articles.title: Matt Forde’s right to grumble – I’d never have taken my babies to a comedy show
articles.description: The amount of vomit and poo they produced with effortless spontaneity would have rendered the experience miserable for all concerned
articles.content:
Comedian Matt Forde has spoken in the past about growing up on benefits in a single parent family. His mum was a former nun.
So some on Twitter clearly expected him to show a bit more Christian forg… [+3271 chars]
